{{def make_nav(pagename, tabname=None):}}
    {{flag = False}} {{for name, caption, url in settings.WIKI.MENUS:}} {{if (tabname and name == tabname) or (not tabname and name == pagename):}} {{cls = 'active'}} {{flag = True}} {{else:}} {{cls = ''}} {{pass}} {{if name == '_History_': url = '/wiki/%s?action=revision' % pagename pass }} {{if name == '_Code_': url = '/wiki/%s?action=code' % pagename pass }}
  • {{=caption}}
    • {{pass}} {{##if not flag:}}
  • {{=pagename}}
    • {{pass##}}
{{pass}}
